Package com.pokego.datamodel

Class GameCheckbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSpriteGroup
      • com.pokego.datamodel.GameSprite
        • com.pokego.datamodel.GameButton
          • com.pokego.datamodel.GameCheckbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable
    public class GameCheckbox
extends GameButton
    GameCheckbox is used to represent a checkbox. It contains a checked and unchecked GameSprite. When the checkbox is clicked, it will invert the current state of the checkbox.
